snippet: Mr. Libo’s research added a level of emotional detail to “World of Our Fathers,” Irving Howe’s landmark 1976 history of the East European Jewish migration to America.
abstract: Kenneth Libo, historian of Jewish immigration, dies at age 74.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Libo’s research added a level of emotional detail to “World of Our Fathers,” Irving Howe’s landmark 1976 history of the East European Jewish migration to America.

headline.seo: Kenneth Libo, Historian of Jewish Immigration, Dies at 74
headline.main: Kenneth Libo, Scholar of Immigrant Life, Dies at 74
headline.print_headline: Kenneth Libo, 74, Scholar of Immigrant Life
